entries.meaning: Synonym of remastering (“new version of a piece of media”)

verbs.description: remaster (third-person singular simple present remasters, present participle remastering, simple past and past participle remastered)

entries.meaning: (music) To produce a new version of a recording by remixing the original master recordings.
(film) To create a new master copy by enhancing sound or picture quality of an older recording.
(video games) To produce a new version of a video game with updated graphics, often re-recorded music, and added features and content.
